cards.name: Anax and Cymede
cards.text:
First strike, vigilance
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anax and Cymede, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Akros's greatest heroes are also its royalty.

cards.name: Armory Guard
cards.text: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.
cards.flavor: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."

cards.name: Auramancer
cards.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

cards.name: Battle Mastery
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor:
"Boom! Boom! Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills!"
—Clachan Tales

cards.name: Beast Within
cards.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller puts a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them."
—Euphemia, Nexus watcher

cards.name: Blood Ogre
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

cards.name: Bonds of Faith
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.
cards.flavor:
"What cannot be destroyed will be bound."
—Oath of Avacyn

cards.name: Boros Guildgate
cards.text:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Enter with merciful hearts. Exit with battle cries.

cards.name: Cavalry Pegasus
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Cavalry Pegasus attacks, each attacking Human gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"It is hope, hooved and winged."
—Cymede, queen of Akros

cards.name: Condemn
cards.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
cards.flavor:
"No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

cards.name: Conquering Manticore
cards.text:
Flying
When Conquering Manticore enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: It speaks no commands but is always obeyed.

cards.name: Crater Hellion
cards.text:
Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Crater Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each other creature.

cards.name: Crowned Ceratok
cards.text:
Trample
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
cards.flavor: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

cards.name: Daily Regimen
cards.text:
Enchant creature
{1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
cards.flavor: What self-indulgence tears down, discipline builds up again.

cards.name: Dawnstrike Paladin
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: She crushes darkness beneath her charger's hooves.

cards.name: Deadly Recluse
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

cards.name: Destructive Revelry
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Destructive Revelry deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
cards.flavor:
"Stoke a fire hot enough and you'll never run out of things to burn."
—Xenagos, the Reveler

cards.name: Deus of Calamity
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Deus of Calamity deals 6 or more damage to an opponent, destroy target land that player controls.
cards.flavor:
"He bears the marks of ages upon his skin, memories of dreams long dead and best left buried."
—The Seer's Parables

cards.name: Dragon Blood
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor: A single drop turns skin to scale and fist to claw.

cards.name: Fencing Ace
cards.text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

cards.name: Figure of Destiny
cards.text:
{R/W}: Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.

cards.name: Fires of Yavimaya
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Yavimaya lights the quickest path to battle.

cards.name: Freewind Equenaut
cards.text:
Flying
As long as Freewind Equenaut is enchanted, it has "{T}: Freewind Equenaut deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature."
cards.flavor: Confront her, and feel the hooves of her steed. Ignore her, and feel the sting of her arrow.

cards.name: Ghor-Clan Savage
cards.text: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
cards.flavor: The snap of sinew. The crunch of bone. A cry for mercy. These are the music of the Gruul.

cards.name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
cards.text: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
cards.flavor: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

cards.name: Griffin Guide
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
When enchanted creature dies, put a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Gustcloak Sentinel
cards.text: Whenever Gustcloak Sentinel becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.
cards.flavor: Entire platoons have mysteriously vanished from battle, leaving enemy weapons to slice through empty air.

cards.name: Kamahl, Pit Fighter
cards.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
{T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: In times when freedom seems lost, great souls arise to reclaim it.

cards.name: Kavu Predator
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever an opponent gains life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kavu Predator.
cards.flavor: In a withered world, the scent of healthy prey is enough to drive a predator to frenzy.

cards.name: Kazandu Refuge
cards.text:
Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Krosan Tusker
cards.text:
Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Llanowar Reborn
cards.text:
Llanowar Reborn enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Graft 1 (This land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this land onto it.)

cards.name: Magma Jet
cards.text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Miraculous Recovery
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: "I am the rock of the polis. Death only strengthens me."

cards.name: Moment of Heroism
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

cards.name: New Benalia
cards.text:
New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped.
When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Nobilis of War
cards.text:
Flying
Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0.
cards.flavor:
"A great siege is a banquet to him; a long and terrible battle, the most exquisite delicacy."
—The Seer's Parables

cards.name: Orcish Lumberjack
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Wood is wasted in the dirt."
—Orcish proverb

cards.name: Ordeal of Purphoros
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Pay No Heed
cards.text: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.
cards.flavor: "My course is before me. There is nothing behind me."

cards.name: Polukranos, World Eater
cards.text:
{X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Polukranos, World Eater becomes monstrous, it deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures your opponents control. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Polukranos.

cards.name: Prey Upon
cards.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor:
"You don't find many old werewolf hunters."
—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

cards.name: Pyroclasm
cards.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
cards.flavor:
"Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?"
—Chandra Nalaar

cards.name: Pyrokinesis
cards.text:
You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost.
Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

cards.name: Regrowth
cards.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: While the root remains, the tree yet lives.

cards.name: Righteousness
cards.text: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Sometimes the greatest strength is the strength of conviction.

cards.name: Satyr Hedonist
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice Satyr Hedonist: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "Any festival you can walk away from wasn't worth attending in the first place."

cards.name: Shower of Sparks
cards.text: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.
cards.flavor: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

cards.name: Skarrg, the Rage Pits
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"This palace will be our fire-spit, and roasted prince our victory meal. Send in the torch-pigs!"
—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

cards.name: Skarrgan Firebird
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
Flying
{R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

cards.name: Skarrgan Skybreaker
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
{1}, Sacrifice Skarrgan Skybreaker: Skarrgan Skybreaker deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"The sky isn't falling—it's being thrown at us!"
—Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

cards.name: Smite the Monstrous
cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: Though the old holy wards and roadside shrines have begun to fail, faith in Avacyn still holds true power.

cards.name: Somberwald Vigilante
cards.text: Whenever Somberwald Vigilante becomes blocked by a creature, Somberwald Vigilante deals 1 damage to that creature.
cards.flavor: He has nothing left but his resentment.

cards.name: Stand Firm
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Stun Sniper
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Stun Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature.
cards.flavor: The tips of her bolts are blunt, but her aim is deadly sharp.

cards.name: Sun Titan
cards.text:
Vigilance
Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: A blazing sun that never sets.

cards.name: Terrifying Presence
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by creatures other than target creature this turn.
cards.flavor: Elmut had slaughtered vampires, slain werewolves, and destroyed hordes of zombies. Sadly, he never got over his fear of spiders.

cards.name: Thraben Valiant
cards.text: Vigilance
cards.flavor: "Once more into Devil's Breach, soldiers. I want another devil tail for my collection."

cards.name: Troll Ascetic
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Troll Ascetic.
cards.flavor: It's no coincidence that the oldest trolls are also the angriest.

cards.name: Truefire Paladin
cards.text:
Vigilance
{R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Undying Rage
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Valley Rannet
cards.text: Mountaincycling {2}, forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Volt Charge
cards.text: Volt Charge deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

cards.name: Winds of Rath
cards.text: Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"There shall be a vast shout and then a vaster silence."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Zhur-Taa Druid
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Whenever you tap Zhur-Taa Druid for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor: "Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."
